meaningMnemonic: When something <kanji>reach</kanji>es <kanji>normal</kanji>, it has finished <vocabulary>diffusion</vocabulary>. Normal things aren't all bunched up and concentrated. Normal things are spread out nice and evenly, via diffusion.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
